type.name: org.gradle.tooling.BuildAction
type.description:
* An action that executes against a Gradle build and produces a result of type {@code T}. * *

You can execute a {@code BuildAction} using the {@link ProjectConnection#action(BuildAction)} method.

* * @param The type of result produced by this action. * @since 1.8

method.name: execute
method.description: * Executes this action and returns the result. * * @param controller The controller to use to access and control the build. * @return The result * @since 1.8
